001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathExpression;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathExpression.ResultType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.impl.DefaultIndex;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.util.ArrayList;
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.regex.Matcher;
022import java.util.regex.Pattern;
023import java.util.stream.Collectors;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
027
028public interface IIndex {
029
030  /**
031   * Construct a new index using the provided key field components to generate
032   * keys.
033   *
034   * @param keyFields
035   *          the key field components to use to generate keys by default
036   * @return the new index
037   */
038  @NonNull
039  static IIndex newInstance(@NonNull List<? extends IKeyField> keyFields) {
040    return new DefaultIndex(keyFields);
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * Check if a key contains information other than {@code null} Strings.
045   *
046   * @param key
047   *          the key to check
048   * @return {@code true} if the series of key values contains only {@code null}
049   *         values, or {@code false} otherwise
050   */
051  static boolean isAllNulls(@NonNull Iterable<String> key) {
052    for (String value : key) {
053      if (value != null) {
054        return false; // NOPMD readability
055      }
056    }
057    return true;
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Retrieve the key field components used to generate a key for this index.
062   *
063   * @return the key field components
064   */
065  @NonNull
066  List<IKeyField> getKeyFields();
067
068  /**
069   * Store the provided item in the index using the index's key field components
070   * to generate the key.
071   *
072   * @param item
073   *          the item to store in the index
074   * @param dynamicContext
075   *          the Metapath evaluation context
076   * @return the previous item stored in the index, or {@code null} otherwise
077   */
078  @Nullable
079  default INodeItem put(@NonNull INodeItem item, @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
080    List<String> key = toKey(item, getKeyFields(), dynamicContext);
081    return put(item, key);
082  }
083
084  /**
085   * Store the provided item using the provided key.
086   *
087   * @param item
088   *          the item to store
089   * @param key
090   *          the key to store the item with
091   * @return the previous item stored in the index using the key, or {@code null}
092   *         otherwise
093   */
094  @Nullable
095  INodeItem put(@NonNull INodeItem item, @NonNull List<String> key);
096
097  /**
098   * Retrieve the item from the index that matches the key generated by evaluating
099   * the index's default key field components against the provided item.
100   *
101   * @param item
102   *          the item to store in the index
103   * @param dynamicContext
104   *          the Metapath evaluation context
105   * @return the previous item stored in the index, or {@code null} otherwise
106   */
107  @Nullable
108  default INodeItem get(@NonNull INodeItem item, @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
109    List<String> key = toKey(item, getKeyFields(), dynamicContext);
110    return get(key);
111  }
112
113  /**
114   * Retrieve the item from the index that matches the provided key.
115   *
116   * @param key
117   *          the key to use for lookup
118   * @return the item with the matching key or {@code null} if no matching item
119   *         was found
120   */
121  INodeItem get(List<String> key);
122
123  /**
124   * Construct a key by evaluating the provided key field components against the
125   * provided item.
126   *
127   * @param item
128   *          the item to generate the key from
129   * @param keyFields
130   *          the key field components used to generate the key
131   * @param dynamicContext
132   *          the Metapath evaluation context
133   * @return a new key
134   */
135  @NonNull
136  static List<String> toKey(@NonNull INodeItem item, @NonNull List<? extends IKeyField> keyFields,
137      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
138    return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(
139        ObjectUtils.notNull(keyFields.stream()
140            .map(keyField -> {
141              assert keyField != null;
142              return buildKeyItem(item, keyField, dynamicContext);
143            })
144            .collect(Collectors.toCollection(ArrayList::new))));
145  }
146
147  /**
148   * Evaluates the provided key field component against the item to generate a key
149   * value.
150   *
151   * @param item
152   *          the item to generate the key value from
153   * @param keyField
154   *          the key field component used to generate the key value
155   * @param dynamicContext
156   *          the Metapath evaluation context
157   * @return the key value or {@code null} if the evaluation resulted in no value
158   */
159  @Nullable
160  private static String buildKeyItem(
161      @NonNull INodeItem item,
162      @NonNull IKeyField keyField,
163      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
164    MetapathExpression keyMetapath = keyField.getTargetMetapath();
165
166    IItem keyItem;
167    try {
168      keyItem = keyMetapath.evaluateAs(item, ResultType.ITEM, dynamicContext);
169    } catch (InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
170      throw new MetapathException("Key path did not result in a single item", ex);
171    }
172
173    String keyValue = null;
174    if (keyItem != null) {
175      keyValue = keyItem.toAtomicItem().asString();
176      assert keyValue != null;
177      Pattern pattern = keyField.getPattern();
178      if (pattern != null) {
179        keyValue = applyPattern(keyMetapath, keyValue, pattern);
180      }
181    } // empty key
182    return keyValue;
183  }
184
185  /**
186   * Apply the key value pattern, if configured, to generate the final key value.
187   *
188   * @param keyItem
189   *          the node item used to form the key field
190   * @param pattern
191   *          the key field pattern configuration from the constraint
192   * @param keyValue
193   *          the current key value
194   * @return the final key value
195   */
196  private static String applyPattern(@NonNull MetapathExpression keyMetapath, @NonNull String keyValue,
197      @NonNull Pattern pattern) {
198    Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(keyValue);
199    if (!matcher.matches()) {
200      throw new MetapathException(
201          String.format("Key field declares the pattern '%s' which does not match the value '%s' of node '%s'",
202              pattern.pattern(), keyValue, keyMetapath));
203    }
204
205    if (matcher.groupCount() != 1) {
206      throw new MetapathException(String.format(
207          "The first group was not a match for value '%s' of node '%s' for key field pattern '%s'",
208          keyValue, keyMetapath, pattern.pattern()));
209    }
210    return matcher.group(1);
211  }
212}
